body.p:
To His Excellency
Thos E. Bramlette
Gov State of Kentucky
Sir

I respectfully request of you, authority to raise an independent company to drive from Green County, (the County of which I am a resident) Ky, the guerrillas who are now infesting that part of this Commonwealth -- killing the soldiers who have served their country for three years -- and doing all manner of unspeakable depredations --

I wish only to raise this independant company for service in Green County and for no definite length of time I can raise a Company of one hundred men in the county -- who will clothe and mount and subsist themselves to drive the desperate & secret enemy from the borders of our county. And all we ask of you -- is the authority to do this -- You furnishing arms & amunition -- all of which we will account for in proper, Army Regulations Form -- I am late 1st Lt. Co. "H". 13th Ky. Vols. U. S. A.

I refer you to Genl. E. H. Hobson, if you
desire any reference for my good character & standing. and efficiency as a soldier
Hoping to receive an answer at your earliest convenience

I remain Govenor
Your obedient servant
Jesse Despain
Application of Jesse Despain to raise an independant company for Green County Ky
